name: Rogue Space (Roaming Maelstrom)
description:
Rogue Space is a 2D Space Rogue-lite made in 7 days for the GameJam 7DRL 2023. 

In Rogue Space, your goal is to Survive for as long as possible and Earn Money to increase your score. To achieve, this you will explore a unique, procedurally generated world, mine rare asteroids, fight evermore powerful enemies, and purchase weapons, items and upgrades for your ship. 

Be careful though! If you die, theres no loading quicksaves or fallbacks; you will have to start again.

How long can you Survive? Post your highscores and time spent alive in the comments below!

Controls

[WASD] - Move Ship Forward, Left, Backward, Right

[Mouse Position] - Control Ships Rotation

[Spacebar] to Boost

[Left Click] to shoot, [Right click] to toggle lock-on-target mode

While locked on, [Spacebar] to toggle "Lock Rotation to Target's Position"

[P] - Pause Game

[M] Open Map

Blue button in bottom right - Enable Fullscreen

F11 - Exit Fullscreen
